channel.title: Searching for website Developer
channel.description:
Hello, this is the owner/founder of Turmoil Rebirth. We are currently looking for a website developer for our new project. We will review and accept applications to interview over. Interviews will be done by myself and the Co-Owner/CEO of Turmoil Rebirth. The server is still under major construction with many update changes to come. To apply please follow this application format.
Age:
Specializations (MySQL,pHp,HTML?):
Past Experience (only accepted if there is proof if no proof do not put down experience):
Experience with cPanel:
What is your purpose of pursuing a position in our development team:
How many hours can you perform your responsibilities per day/week:
Have you held any position with another RSPS:
What are the past RSPS Servers you have worked with if yes:
Would you be willing to attend your interview over Skype via Voice Chat?:
Please, if you apply with experience then have proof to go with it, note if you do not have proof this does not disqualify you.
P.s: After full construction is done as our server progresses our team will be rewarded for there efforts.

item.title: Searching for website Developer
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

Age: 16

Specializations (MySQL,pHp,HTML?): I’m very advanced with PHP and MySQL, also very good with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Along with some knowledge of design concepts (what is visually pleasing to viewers of a website), and Ajaxx experience.

Past Experience (only accepted if there is proof if no proof do not put down experience):
Tons of projects and other servers, I’ve worked on my own website development company the past couple years.
Here are some of my moparscape threads and releases/projects:

  • http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,567986.msg4124692.html#msg4124692

  • http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,562232.msg4099895.html#msg4099895

  • Long list of what I know: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,562136.msg4099332.html#msg4099332

  • http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,558671.msg4085594.html#msg4085594

  • http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,557648.msg4080031.html#msg4080031

This is from my older account, EclipseRuins:

  • http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,529925.msg3868525.html#msg3868525
  • http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,537548.msg3930637.html#msg3930637
  • http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,537715.msg3933058.html#msg3933058
  • http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,536919.msg3926149.html#msg3926149
  • http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,537738.msg3932511.html#msg3932511

Experience with cPanel: cPanel = Control Panel, which is different for each web hosting company, for the most part. I’ve worked with tons of different cPanel’s, they’re all fairly similar and easy for me to navigate.

What is your purpose of pursuing a position in our development team:
I took a break from RSPS and website development for a while, and I’m trying to get back into it. And this seems like a nice server.

How many hours can you perform your responsibilities per day/week:
At least three hours a day.

Have you held any position with another RSPS:
Yes

What are the past RSPS Servers you have worked with if yes:
Several different servers…

[ul][li]HaloScape[/li]
[li]Runeiverse[/li]
[li]Tantalizing-317[/li]
[li]EclipseRuins[/li]
[li]OldSchoolScape[/li]
[li]317 Fury[/li]
[li]Blitz-PK[/li]
[li]More that I’m having troubles remembering.[/li][/ul]

Would you be willing to attend your interview over Skype via Voice Chat?:
Of course, my Skype username is aj.cordio, feel free to add me if you think I’ll be a good addition to the development team.

Read full topic

item.title: Searching for website Developer
item.dc:creator: @Venge_Drop Venge Drop
item.description:
@Venge_Drop wrote:

Well it’s not a purchase or a paycheck it’s more of a thank you for a great job kind of thing that’s why it says rewarded

Read full topic

item.title: Searching for website Developer
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Good luck.
I always enjoy seeing a server development practicing a professional approach; all that’s left for you to do now is walk the walk.

P.s: After full construction is done as our server progresses our team will be rewarded for there efforts.
I'm not so comfortable about this statement, but I suppose it is allowed if you aren't organizing it through these forums.

Read full topic

item.title: Searching for website Developer
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

The CEO of a private server? That’s a first that I’ve heard of that lol.

A lot of starting out servers pursue that route to make them look more professional, it sometimes works and sometimes doesn’t. There’s quite a few of the bigger servers over the years who have actually registered themselves as companies and use hidden structures like this and the usual administrator ranks on the surface for players to see. Definitely not a first, though :P.

OT: Moved it to the right section.

Read full topic

item.title: Searching for website Developer

item.description:
